meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>courteous</kanji> <kanji>parent</kanji> is a parent who knows when a kid needs a friend. Then, they set their kid up with you so that you can have a <vocabulary>friendship</vocabulary>. What a nice parent the other person is!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
